raw_input.text:
DDB Sydney has engaged Leah Thompson to provide services for the New retail Series on behalf of Show Time. As consumers increasingly seek sustainable products, Australians are seeking enhanced retail solutions. As the campaign's campaign lead, Leah Thompson will deliver key messages across media and social channels. This campaign reinforces the brand's leadership in retail.

INFLUENCER AGREEMENT

This agreement is between Show Time and the Influencer for Show Time Family Campaign 2025.

COMMERCIAL TERMS:
- Total Fee: $38,446 AUD (inclusive of GST)
- Payment Terms: Net 30 days from invoice date
- Invoice Requirements: Tax invoice required upon completion

DELIVERABLES:
- 3 x Instagram posts

TERMS AND CONDITIONS:
- Engagement Period: 2 months
- Exclusivity Period: 8 weeks
- Territory: Australia
- Usage Rights: 24 months from campaign launch
- Content Rights: Show Time retains full commercial rights

COMPLIANCE:
- All content must comply with ACMA guidelines and ASA codes
- Content is subject to client approval before publication
- Disclosure requirements must be met per ACCC guidelines

LEGAL:
This agreement is governed by Australian law and subject to the jurisdiction of Australian courts.

Agreed terms are subject to final contract execution.

template_mapping.best_template_match: profile_TKB Influencer Agreement_Jamie Durie x Cabot_s EasyDeck
fallback_templates: profile_TKB Influencer Agreement - Dr Claire x Australia Post Dog Safety Campaign
